settings.info: 阶梯、折扣名称和折扣码用'='隔开，每条折扣信息用','隔开 格式如：$79=20%OFF=UA20,$129=25%OFF=UA25,$179=30%OFF=UA30

settings.label: 折扣码内容突出背景色

settings.content: This theme is fully supported by Shopify. If you faced a problem with Installation, Creating navigation or Configuration our theme, please, read our [documentation](http://adornthemes.com/documentation/avon) online. Or feel free to create support ticket from [support page](https://www.adornthemes.com/support/). We will help you as soon as possible. We would be glad if you help us to improve our theme, installation process or documentation. Thank You!

settings.content: 1) Shopify: This feature is only available for stores using Shopify Payments. First Check [list of supported countries](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/shopify-payments-requirements#can-I-use-shopify-payments)
Your customers can pay for their orders and receive refunds in their local currency. [Enabling multiple currencies](https://help.shopify.com/manual/payments/multi-currency/setup).

2) AdornThemes: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency. You need to [edit your store's currency formatting](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/multiple-currencies-setup/).

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Show Language?
settings.info: [Install weglot app to use multilanguage on your store](https://dashboard.weglot.com/register?fp_ref=adornthemes)

settings.label: Choose Language menu
settings.info: [How to create languages menu for weglot?](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/how-to-create-languages-menu-for-weglot/)
